interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Yayoge Poly Gel Nail Kit 4 Colors Builder Gel for Nails with Nail Art Tools Nail Extension Gel with Slip Solution All In One Kit for Nail Manicure Beginner Starter Kit DIY at Home
Review Date: 2021/01/19
Store: yayoge
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {}
Review Text: I love sets like these because it comes with everything you need to do your nails! Even the UV nail lamp! My little cousin loves seeing her older cousin do nails and I wanted her to start with something a little bit easier to work with that’s why I chose polygel because you can take as long as you need to work it around to your liking and no matter how messed up it may be you can file it into shape. It even gives nice gel color polishes to choose from and some pretty decors to add. She’s gonna love it! The polygel tubes are a bit small but are great for her starting off and with 7 colors she can choose what she wants to work with and have no problems!
Review Title: Perfect for Beginners!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
COSYMAY 20 inch Human Hair Wig for Women Long Black Wig with Bangs 4x4 Lace Closure Straight Wig Brazilian Virgin Hair Full Wig Average Size 1B COSYMAY {'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Brand': 'COSYMAY', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '9.96 x 6.73 x 2.72 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '738627428647'} [[VIDEOID:9118ad20b0e9a447f9b3a276479f331c]] Wow! This hair is gorgeous! Very nice thickness for a 20 inch and silky to the touch with so much body. The closure is perfect on this wig as well! Just to give you guys an idea of the body of this hair I uploaded videos but excuse me for still having my edges wrapped up lol Silky and Quality Hair! Senegalese Twist Crochet Hair Extensions Ombre-Brown - 32inch 8Packs Synthetic Crochet Braids Pre Looped Crochet Hair Synthetic Braiding Hair (32 inch, T30) ToyoTree {'Package Dimensions': '16.5 x 7.2 x 2.1 inches; 1.6 Pounds', 'UPC': '781827816141'} [[VIDEOID:a3e393606a2e6dcef86b83ecc97fa694]] These are a very nice quality synthetic hair but they are small so I’d you’re going for a more fuller look I suggest getting more but if you’re going to space your crochets quite a bit or do individuals with these you should be okay. Very long too, but it’s great they give you a free gift of the crochet needle and jewels so no need for a store trip! Nice Quality Twist But May Need More Packs! lorelo 20 pieces Hair Curlers, Hair Rollers Spiral Curls Styling Kit No Heat Hair Curlers with Styling Hooks for Girls Woman lorelo {'Number of Items': '20', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Brand': 'Lorelo', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '10.59 x 9.02 x 2.8 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '619156721396'} Perfect for curling hair the heartless way! The application stick is very long so it can be very useful to long hair types and the application can be adjusted to shorted types by removing a layer. Easy application as well! For application:
-slide hook side first through the roller while it is stretched out
-make sure when you slide it through the hook is showing as well as the bottom of the tool so you can pull it easy off your hair
-hook a small section of your hair (start at the root)
- once your hair is hooked hold the top of the curler gently and the bottom of the tool and gently pull your hair through until the entire hook is out and your hair is covered by the curler.
-and your done! (For best results leave it on overnight if you can!)
Hope this helps anyone! ❤️ Perfect Heatless Curling tool! Nail Powder Vcedas 12 Colors Acrylic Powder Set for Nail UV Gel Powder Dust Design Decoration 3D Manicure Vcedas {'Product Dimensions': '5.91 x 3.94 x 0.79 inches; 6.38 Ounces'} Nice vibrant colors! Very inclusive powder set with so many colors to choose from! Can’t wait to try this on my nails!! You must buy the acrylic liquid and brush applicator separate! Colors are perfect! Nail Files 16 Pcs, Double Sided Emery Board Manicure Tools for Filing Natural Gel and Acrylic Nails for Home and Salon Use Keiby Citom {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Keiby Citom', 'Grit Number': '100', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 5.08 x 0.59 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '742025065137', 'Manufacturer': 'YHIT'} I used these to file at my acrylic nails in the application process and these did me wonders! Also I used this file it off when I’m removing my acrylic and it works perfect! Perfect For Natural and Acrylic Nails! Face and Body Paint Kit By Color Technik 24 Professional Oil Based Flash Colors, 2 Sets of 12 Color Palettes, 6 Paint Brushes 70 Stencils 2 Sponges Non-Toxic For Adults & Kids Halloween Painting Party Color Technik {'Brand': 'Color Technik', 'Package Information': 'Palette', 'Package Type': 'Palette', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 5 x 1 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'CTFPS24'} Nice pigment in the colors. Nice and bright. Got this for Halloween so it’s going to do justice with my costume and my kids costume! Cant Wait Until Halloween. lootaan 500 Pieces False Nails French Acrylic Fake Nails Tips Half Cover Artificial Fake Nails With Box and False Nail Clipper for Women Girl lootaan {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'lootaan', 'Number of Pieces': '500', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6 x 2 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '710157699223'} Just what I expected from nails tips. These are the perfect quality and shape. Can’t wait to use these for my acrylic application! Just What I Needed! Brazilian Straight Bundles Human Hair 3 Bundles 10A Straight Weave Hair Bundles 100% Unprocessed Virgin Hair Extensions Natural Black (22 24 26) ALIANNA {'Brand': 'ALIANNA', 'Color': 'black', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '11.69 x 9.72 x 3.43 inches; 10.86 Ounces'} [[VIDEOID:c2e5a1ca1a75fceabb11204b06346775]] Honestly these are the longest bundles I’ve ever had lol as all wefted hair, longer hair lengths means thinner bundles and that’s kind of the case with these. Although they are on the thinner side they have a natural pattern that goes thickest from the wefted hair and thins out to the bottom giving you a more natural look when installed. The hair has plenty of movement and very soft to the touch. The luster is there as you can see when my light hits it. I’m also glad that the color isn’t super black and has natural black color with hints of brown. I know that it’s gonna but the below my back with these lengths so hopefully I don’t sit on it by mistake lol Luster And Softness! It There! Cant Wait To Install! Yayoge Poly Gel Nail Kit 4 Colors Builder Gel for Nails with Nail Art Tools Nail Extension Gel with Slip Solution All In One Kit for Nail Manicure Beginner Starter Kit DIY at Home yayoge {} I love sets like these because it comes with everything you need to do your nails! Even the UV nail lamp! My little cousin loves seeing her older cousin do nails and I wanted her to start with something a little bit easier to work with that’s why I chose polygel because you can take as long as you need to work it around to your liking and no matter how messed up it may be you can file it into shape. It even gives nice gel color polishes to choose from and some pretty decors to add. She’s gonna love it! The polygel tubes are a bit small but are great for her starting off and with 7 colors she can choose what she wants to work with and have no problems! Perfect for Beginners!
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Type Preference:** The user has expanded their interests to include polygel nail kits, alongside their consistent focus on human hair extensions, wigs, crochet hair extensions, face and body paint products, and nail care items like acrylic products. Their recent purchases highlight a commitment to comprehensive beauty solutions, indicating a strong interest in nail art and enhancements.

- **Quality Expectations:** They maintain high standards for beauty products, focusing on vibrancy, variety, and quality, particularly in hair extensions and nail care. The user appreciates products that offer ease of use and a professional finish, especially for beginners.

- **Brand Familiarity:** The user engages positively with reputable beauty brands while remaining open to discovering new options that complement their aesthetic goals across various beauty categories, including hair and nail care supplies.

- **Visual Engagement:** They actively share multimedia content, including reviews and personal experiences, showcasing their passion for hair and nail aesthetics within the beauty community.

- **Attention to Detail:** The user emphasizes product features that enhance usability and performance, ensuring their choices meet both artistic and practical needs, particularly for DIY beauty applications.

- **User Engagement Style:** They demonstrate enthusiasm and provide thorough feedback, enriching community interactions with valuable insights.

- **Rating Trends:** The user typically assigns high ratings to products that align with their quality expectations, reinforcing their dedication to obtaining functional and aesthetically pleasing beauty options for both hair and nails.

Overall, the user exhibits a discerning eye for high-quality beauty products, actively contributing their knowledge and enthusiasm within the beauty community.
